name: Little Orbits
description:
Defend the Planet from Asteroids as things get progressively worse. Luck probably won't be on your side as asteroids crash into each-other and come plummeting down. Hit the "Dice Clusters" to activate a random effect.

Controls:

A / D -> Rotate

Space -> Fire

G or Left Shift -> Activate Shockwave (time it right to bypass the reload)

Effects: 

Gravity Pulse, Asteroid Health Regen, Slow Time, Increase Laser Strength, Player Immunity, Clear All Asteroids
